IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: Charles River School is an independent school offering students in pre-kindergarten through eighth grade a strong academic program in an environment that celebrates learning and values each member of its community.
IRS990.MissionDescription: Charles River School is an independent school offering students in pre-kindergarten through eighth grade a strong academic program in an environment that celebrates learning and values each member of its community.
IRS990.Description: SCHOOL- CHARLES RIVER SCHOOL IS AN INDEPENDENT SCHOOL OFFERING STUDENTS IN PRE-KINDERGARTEN THROUGH GRADE EIGHT A STRONG ACADEMIC PROGRAM IN AN ENVIRONMENT THAT CELEBRATES LEARNING AND VALUES EACH MEMBER OF ITS COMMUNITY.

Activity2.Description: SUMMER PROGRAM- THE CHARLES RIVER CREATIVE ARTS PROGRAM IS A SUMMER PROGRAM FOR CHILDREN 8-15 YEARS OF AGE. STUDENTS CHOOSE FROM OVER 130 COURSES IN ART, MUSIC AND DRAMA IN TWO FOUR WEEK SESSIONS.

Activity3.Description: EXTENDED DAY PROGRAM- THE EXTENDED DAY PROGRAM IS AN IMPORTANT EXTENSION OF THE SCHOOL DAY. IN THE COURSE OF THE DAY, WE OFFER CHILDREN BOTH TEACHER-DIRECTED ACTIVITIES AND THE FREEDOM TO MAKE THEIR OWN CHOICES.

Form990ScheduleCPartIV.Explanation: THE SCHOOL PAYS A MEMBERSHIP FEE TO THE MASSACHUSETTS ASSOCIATION OF NONPROFIT SCHOOLS AND COLLEGES. THE FEE IS BASED ON THE NUMBER OF STUDENTS ATTENDING THE SCHOOL.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: PART XII, LINE 2D, FINANCIAL AID NETTED WITH REVENUE ON THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. PART XIII, LINE 4B, FINANCIAL AID NETTED WITH REVENUE ON THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

IRS990ScheduleE.PubViaBroadcastMediaExpln: The School's racially non-discriminatory policy is included in all communications. SPecifically, it was advertised in the boston globe newspaper as part of the Association for independent schools in new england public notice of non-discrimination.

Form990ScheduleIPartIII.TypeOfGrant: Charles River Creative Arts Program Financial Aid

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Financial aid is granted on the basis of financial need and is netted against gross tuition and fees. Dependents of the Schools employees pay tuition unless they qualify on the same need basis as non-employee students.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: The School sponsors and contributes to an IRC Section 457(b) plan for the Head of School. The School contributed $60,000 to this plan for the year ended June 30, 2010. This contribution, along with prior contributions, is deferred. The total contributions, net of investment returns, total $384,076 for the year ended June 30, 2010. The School will pay the net deferred compensation under this plan upon the Head of School leaving the School.

Form990ScheduleKPartI.DescriptionOfPurpose: TO CONSTRUCT A BUILDING & IMPROVE FACILITIES

Form990ScheduleLPartIV.Relationship: partner with a law firm that served as bond council

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 2
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE TREASURER AND THE PRESIDENT ARE BUSINESS PARTNERS IN A CONSULTING FIRM CALLED RED SKY PARTNERS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 6
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: According the by laws of the school, membership in the school consists of the parents of the children enrolled in the school, the board of trustees, members of the educational staff and parent council.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: According to the by laws, the members have the authority to elect the governing body.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7b
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The members have the authority to elect the governing body and approve ammendments to the by laws.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: A DRAFT COPY OF THE FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO THE BUSINESS MANAGER AND THE HEAD OF SCHOOL FOR REVIEW. ONCE MANAGEMENT REVIEW HAS BEen COMPLETED, THE AUDIT COMMITTEE SCHEDULES A SPECIAL MEETING TO CONDUCT A REVIEW OF THE FORM 990. THIS SPECIAL MEETING SHALL BE OPEN TO ANY MEMBER OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES WHO WISHES TO PARTICIPATE.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Charles River School, Inc. requires an annual sign off from Directors disclosing interests that could give rise to conflict of interest. The conflict of interest statements are submitted for review to the school.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The process for determining the compensation of the Charles River School, Inc's Head of school requires review and approval by the board of trustees. All other employee compensation is reviewed and approved annually by the head of the School.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The School makes its governing documents, conflict of interest policy, and financial statements available to the public upon request and the form PC is filed with the division of public charities.
